page.title: 14Religion 2
page.content:
{ Wreyfield Drive,}one of the three Methodist churches, was built in 1956, has a relatively young congregation of about 55 and has 2 Sunday services.
{ Northstead,}also opened in the 1950s, holds two Sunday services for an average congregation, mostly of young families, of 155.
{ Scalby}is the smallest. Built in 1873, it has two Sunday services for an older congregation averaging 50.
The Methodists have three circuit preachers.
Ebenezer Baptist church, built in 1911, has a minister, an average attendance of 80, 2 Sunday services and a Prayer and Bible study meeting on Wednesdays.
